user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Setup and Environment Configuration
epics.summary: Establish foundational architecture and development environment
epics.description: Set up the initial architecture of the system, configure development environments, and ensure all required tools and dependencies are installed. This includes repository creation, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and establishing project structure for smooth collaboration across teams.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user registration and login
epics.description: Develop secure authentication and authorization modules to handle user sign-ups, logins, and role-based access. Integrate necessary encryption, token management, and session handling mechanisms to ensure user data is safe and interactions are protected.

epics.title: Core Feature Implementation
epics.summary: Build primary functionality based on project goals
epics.description: Develop and integrate the main features that form the core functionality of the application. This includes the logic, workflows, and interactions that deliver the value proposition to users. Ensure performance, reliability, and maintainability throughout the development process.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Create an intuitive and cohesive user interface
epics.description: Design and develop a user interface that is intuitive, responsive, and aesthetically consistent. Focus on user experience by conducting design iterations, UI prototyping, and usability testing to ensure the product meets user expectations and interaction needs.

epics.title: Advanced Features and Integrations
epics.summary: Integrate advanced modules and third-party services
epics.description: Enhance the platform by introducing optional advanced features such as analytics, notifications, or integration with external APIs and services. Ensure all integrations are seamless, secure, and well-documented, providing scalability for future growth.

epics.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
epics.summary: Ensure product quality through comprehensive testing
epics.description: Implement a testing strategy covering unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests. Conduct performance and security testing to ensure product stability and reliability before final deployment.

epics.title: Deployment and Release Management
epics.summary: Deploy the system to production environment
epics.description: Prepare the production environment, configure deployment pipelines, and execute the release of the product to ensure stable operation in production. Establish rollback mechanisms, monitoring, and logging for post-deployment health checks.

epics.title: Maintenance, Monitoring, and Continuous Improvement
epics.summary: Maintain, monitor, and enhance the application post-launch
epics.description: After release, focus on continuous maintenance, monitoring application health, and implementing user feedback. Address bugs, optimize performance, and add incremental improvements to sustain long-term system value.

user_stories.title: Set Up Version Control Repository
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up and configure a version control repository so that all project code can be stored and collaboratively developed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Repository must support branching and merging, and be accessible by all team members.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Repository is created and accessible by the team. 2. Repo supports branching, merging, and version history.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the repository setup is complete, When a developer tries to push code, Then the repository must accept the code and version it.

user_stories.title: Set Up Development Environments
user_stories.description: As a team, we need consistent development, testing, and staging environments configured to match the production setup so the deployment process is smooth and error-free.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Environments must mirror production setup as close as possible; all services and databases must be replicated.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Dev Environment, Test Environment, Staging Environment
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Development, testing, and staging environments are set up and tested. 2. Environments are accessible and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the environments are set up, When a developer runs tests, Then the tests must pass similarly across all environments.

user_stories.title: Implement User Registration Capability
user_stories.description: As a new user, I want to register using my credentials or social login so that I can access application features after authentication.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support email/password and social logins (e.g., Google, Facebook).
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can register using an email and password. 2. Users can register using social login.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, When they attempt to register, Then the registration should be successful using both methods (email/password, social login).

user_stories.title: Implement Password Reset Functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password securely via an email or SMS verification process so that I can regain access to my account without compromising security.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Password reset must be secure; use email or SMS for verification.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can request a password reset. 2. Users can reset the password using a verification code sent via email or SMS.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user requesting a password reset, When they follow the reset link, Then they should be able to reset their password after verifying the code.

user_stories.title: Develop Core Functionalities
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to perform the core actions that the application enables so that I can achieve the intended tasks efficiently and accurately.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Core functionalities must cover critical user tasks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Core actions are fully functional. 2. User workflows are smooth and intuitive.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core functionalities developed, When a user performs a core action, Then it should execute smoothly and accurately.

user_stories.title: Validate User Inputs and Handle Errors
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the application to validate my input and provide clear error messages so that I can easily correct mistakes and continue using the system seamlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: All user inputs must be validated, and clear error messages should be shown.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. All inputs are validated. 2. Clear and helpful error messages are provided.
user_stories.test_cases: Given invalid user input, When the user submits the form, Then a clear error message should be displayed.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the interface to adapt seamlessly to my device so that I can use the application whether I'm on a mobile, tablet, or desktop.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Responsive design must work across various devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Interface adapts seamlessly to different devices. 2. Usability is consistent across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When accessing the application, Then the interface should adapt seamlessly.

user_stories.title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want to interact with the system through accessible features like keyboard navigation and screen reader support so that I have an equitable user experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support screen readers and keyboard navigation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Application is usable with screen readers. 2. All actions can be performed using keyboard navigation.
user_stories.test_cases: Given accessibility tools, When using the application, Then navigation and usage should be seamless.

user_stories.epic_title: Testing, Quality Assurance, and Release Preparation
user_stories.title: Perform Functional Testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to validate that all developed features behave as expected under various conditions so that the system remains robust.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Test cases should cover various conditions including edge cases.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Test cases are comprehensive and cover all features. 2. All tests pass successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the test cases, When executed, Then all features should behave as expected.

user_stories.epic_title: Testing, Quality Assurance, and Release Preparation
user_stories.title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
user_stories.description: As a stakeholder, I want to review the system against requirements so that I can approve the product for deployment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: UAT must reflect real-world usage scenarios.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. All requirements are met. 2. Stakeholders approve the functionality.
user_stories.test_cases: Given UAT scenarios, When stakeholders test the product, Then all requirements should be met satisfactorily.

user_stories.title: Deploy Application to Production
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the stable build of the application into production so that users can begin using the live system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Deployment pipeline must ensure zero downtime and rollback capabilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Stable build is deployed successfully. 2. No downtime during deployment.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a stable build, When deploying to production, Then deployment should be successful with no downtime.

user_stories.title: Integrate Analytics for Monitoring
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want analytics integrated into the system to monitor engagement and performance so that I can make informed decisions for future improvements.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Analytics should track user behavior and system performance metrics.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Analytics tool is integrated. 2. User behavior and performance metrics are tracked.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the integrated analytics, When monitoring user behavior, Then data should be available for analysis.
